summary: Adds a speeder bike to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
MurdermiesteR here with another terrible mod to shun. This one adds a speeder bike to Skyrim. Meshes and textures by myself. Find it outside Dawnstar. Head out of town, past the filthy kitty campground and keep movin for a short while. It will be off to the right. I suggest detect life.
It rides smooth and quick. It also gets pretty good air time, too.

"Why so off and a pain to find?"

No other mods are putting anything there or changing that world space....probably.



[center] [credits]
Bethesda
Star Wars
3DS Max
NifSkope
Gimp
Nightasy tutorials
Nexus forums
MurdermiesteR (me)
And thanks to Kal-El the Kryptonian for advice and help with the CK retardedness.
[/center]

"This mod sucks. And you suck for making it."

Thank you for your input. Currently this mod is merely a hand made speeder weighted to a horse skeleton. Then it got a custom horse race named speeder bike to call home with bad references to used animations. I am working on getting the sounds to work. They are in the mod, I just haven't figured out wtf. Once they are working, I'll get some killer ones made to replace the ones in it. If you get them working and send me the esp or tell me wtf, I might send you some thing I made for my self....and of course credits. If you are a killer mod maker and want to rip my stuff off and make it bada$$, you are a bad person that.....that I'll endorse. I obviously want a speeder bike mod.
author: MurdermiesteR

files.name: Speeder Bike
files.changelogHtml:
Increased speed of bike.
Removed more horse references to CK.
Health increased and other stupid value adjusting.
